| ---------------- | ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |

| `legendPosition` | `legend-position`  |                                                                                                               | `"bottom" \| "bottom-left" \| "bottom-right" \| "left" \| "none" \| "right" \| "top" \| "top-left" \| "top-right"` | `'right'`   |
| `legendTitle`    | `legend-title`     |                                                                                                               | `string`                                                                                                           | `undefined` |
